A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been watching the Star Wars films since childhood and carried the tradition on with my children. The series has been a part of my world for as long as I can remember and this is the first time I have considered not buying a film from the series. I am so disappointed. Bad characters\,  graphics\, and concepts. Poor planning and plot holes. Ridiculous story lines and a useless\, unrealistic romance. Scrap this director and move back to JJ and maybe he can restore the Skywalker family's former glory.
